name: Mali Namphu Guest House

reviews.text: Had read the review in TripAdvisor Travel Community and was attracted to the guesthouse as the rooms are facing the courtyard. Emailed the property directly and had requested for room on the ground floor as my mom was having diffculty to climb staircase. The staff was very obliging and had allocated Room 110 for us. Enjoyed their daily breakfast and it is nice place to stay and was within our budget.
reviews.title: Value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The down side are the mosquitoes.
reviews.title: nice indeed!

likes.disliked: — not much daylight in the room but hey, Who wants to spend the day in the room!

reviews.text: We booked by phone the night before.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel!

reviews.text: Do get a room on the ground floor, they are the nicest, surrounded by courtyard.
reviews.title: Handy location

reviews.text: Breakfast is included, simple but convenient.
reviews.title: Nice little guest house for the money

likes.liked: — Nice little garden area around the breakfast area
likes.disliked: — Climbing all those steps to the room -- choose a deluxe for less steps

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were given a downstairs room in the corner of the courtyard. I can only assume the room had not been used for a few days, because we had a big mosquito problem. When informed the reception staff did come immediately to spray the room. -blaming the bedroom staff for not spraying it before our arrival. Bedroom service was very sloppy, with staff forgetting to leave towels etc. and we returned to the room one day to find an ashtray had been knocked to the floor, - not by us- there was broken glass everywhere.
reviews.title: "Sloppy"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room itself was comfortable with multi channel TV and AC.
reviews.title: Loved it!!
Mixed bag!
reviews.text: I enjoyed the breakfast choices each day.

reviews.title: Excellent service!
reviews.text: Maii Namphu is well situated. Just a shame that sloppiness lets them down.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: An amazing hotel for its value. Super-friendly staff, free breakfast and good location. Nothing more that you can wish for for your $16
reviews.title: Good Value B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Mali Namphu is a clean and central hotel, 5 minutes walk from the river and close to a number of the other sites with lots of restaurants and facilities close by.
reviews.title: Central location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel has a great courtyard for eating and reading and serves a free [but small] breakfast.
reviews.title: Price hike but generally OK

reviews.text: The rooms were clean and tidy and adequate for what we needed - you'll need to book early if you're after a downstairs room that opens onto the courtyard.
reviews.title: Great location, lovely courtyard for breakfast

likes.disliked: — the tuk tuk drivers around the hotel entrance

reviews.text: We arrived on spec in Dec 07 based on lonely planet guidance written in Sep 07 that rooms ranged $11-$17 per night. However, the double room was $25 following a price hike. The hotel is in a good location with a decent breakfast and nice courtyard, though our room was a little tired.
reviews.title: A little tired but great location

reviews.text: Watch the "VIP" bus option offered to Vang Vieng at 60,000 kip, which the hotel implied was an aircon, new double-deck bus with toilet, but was actually a very old standard bus. We realise this is normal transport, but were disappointed to be promised and to pay for something different.
reviews.title: Could not even set foot- thanks to a non-responsive reception

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although it was okay, it was overpriced when compared to similar hotels in the city. We confirmed by email and stated we would be arriving late, which they confrmed.
reviews.title: Will not be back soon

reviews.text: However when we arrived, we found our booking has been crossed through, and then they offered us only 1 night, instead of the 3 we'd booked.
reviews.title: Nice Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was okay, but the sheets has not been cleaned, and when we asked for replacemements, we were informed it was too late in the evening to change them.
reviews.title: Good Value in Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although many people rate this place, I think they have become overconfident of having bookings and so have let standards slip.
reviews.title: Great location with clean rooms and good service

reviews.text: I stayed there 2 nights from 14 ~ 15th Feb. Nice clean rooms with air conditioning, quite shielded from the main street , located at namphuu fountain which is a landmark where a lot of tut tut drivers would know. Dont let me small entrance fool you , it opens up to the nice courtyard in the middle where you have your complimentary breakfast there.
reviews.title: Good value for money and centrally located

likes.disliked: — breakfast choice most days only one option - has to be 2 at mininium

aka: Mali Namphu Guest House Hotel Vientiane
